title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-4.11 - Emergency service requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-4.11 - Emergency service requirements

State Regulations

Each operator of an underground facility containing gas
or liquid petroleum products shall provide means for accepting emergency calls
and prompt field assistance to such call on a 24 hour-per-day
basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
753-4.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
